Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Display
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Display
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Display class print out the location of the robot. In other words, it output the odometer parameter.
    Author:
    George Kandalaft
